name: William F. MATHIAS et al. v. ROCKWELL MANUFACTURING CO. et al.

parties: William F. MATHIAS et al. v. ROCKWELL MANUFACTURING CO. et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.

attorneys: Higgins, Cavanagh & Cooney, Mark P. McKenney, Providence, for petitioners.
Robert M. Silva, Ltd., David F. Fox, Mid-dletown, for respondents.
casebody.head_matter:
William F. MATHIAS et al. v. ROCKWELL MANUFACTURING CO. et al.
No. 82-114-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
April 1, 1982.
Higgins, Cavanagh & Cooney, Mark P. McKenney, Providence, for petitioners.
Robert M. Silva, Ltd., David F. Fox, Mid-dletown, for respondents.
